desc: Maui Medicinal offers organic herbal formulations which are antioxidant, anti-stress and highly absorb-able plant based nutrients for cleansing & strengthening bodies & minds. Hawaii Kava, Kukui Nut, Mamaki, Noni, Papaya; American Echinacea, Goldenseal; Ayurveda Ashwagandha, Ginger, Gotu kola, Neem, Turmeric, Triphala

layout.text: Locally grown and harvested in Hawaii, all loaded with powerful antioxidants
